posts.post_content:
Buy these before I come to my senses!  You just don't see these coming up very often.

I have the following T217 Mono Cigarettes for sale.  All prices are  net   to me, I  accept PP friends and family, or for Regular PP please add 3%   to  cover fees.  Items will  ship upon  receipt of cleared payment.    Shipping is included.  Thanks for looking.

Chadbourn, SGC 50, [strike]$1250[/strike]Sold
Burrell, SGC A, [strike]$175[/strike]SoldS (trimmed)

PM or e-mail me with any questions.
Message sent on the Burrell.  I'll take it if still available.
